channel.title: Dokumentacija Scratch Addons
channel.description: Nedavna vsebina na Dokumentacija Scratch Addons

item.title: Quick Start
item.description: Namestitev Začnite tako, da namestite Scratch Addons. Na voljo je v Spletni trgovini Chrome in Dodatkih za Firefox. Spletna trgovina Chrome (za Google Chrome in druge brskalnike, narejene na podlagi Chromium) Dodatki za Firefox (za Mozilla Firefox) Microsoft Edge Add-ons (for Microsoft Edge) Za začetek To get started, you need to access the settings page of the addon to see the functions of it. Locate Scratch Addons on the toolbar and click it.

item.title: Namestitev
item.description: Iz trgovin z razširitvami Scratch Addons je na voljo v Spletni trgovini Chrome in v Dodatkih za Firefox. Spletna trgovina Chrome (za Google Chrome, Opera, Brave, Vivaldi, Microsoft Edge >79 in druge brskalnike, narejene na osnovi Chromium) https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/fbeffbjdlemaoicjdapfpikkikjoneco Dodatki za Firefox (za brskalnik Mozilla Firefox) https://addons.mozilla.org/firefox/addon/scratch-messaging-extension/ Dodatki Microsoft Edge (za Microsoft Edge >79) https://microsoftedge.microsoft.com/addons/detail/iliepgjnemckemgnledoipfiilhajdjj Z izvirno kodo About GitHub releases The releases page contains the code and installation files for all development builds of Scratch Addons, as well as the mirror of the store builds.
